test-set.name: result-document
test-set.description: Tests the xsl:result-document instruction. Note: most of the tests concern serialization; very few actually generate multiple output documents.

source.content: <!-- A required but useless input XML doc for a transformation --><doc/>

test-case.name: result-document-0101
test-case.description: Switch to secondary output and back to primary - sequentially.

test-case.name: result-document-0102
test-case.description: Base URI of nodes in secondary result document

test-case.name: result-document-0201
test-case.description: Use named output format on secondary output

modified.change: Declared serialization requirement; change tests to serialized form

assert-result-document.assert-serialization: This should come out as plain text.

test-case.name: result-document-0202
test-case.description: Use named output format on primary output

result.assert-serialization: This document should be serialized as text, not as xml because the un-named xsl:format (i.e. no 'name' attribute) has method "text".

test-case.name: result-document-0203
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result document with no attributes. Output is controlled by unnamed xsl:output declaration.

test-case.name: result-document-0204
test-case.description: That href of an empty string for xsl:result-docuemnt is OK

test-case.name: result-document-0205
test-case.description: Test that the primary result document can be written after a secondary one by use of nested xsl:result-document with no arguments.

test-case.name: result-document-0206
test-case.description: Simple test with xsl:result-document - empty content and no attributes. Output file contains only the XML declaration.

test-case.name: result-document-0207
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document that creates a non-well-formed XML document entity (contains more than one document element).

test-case.name: result-document-0208
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document with missing @method. Allow XML output method to be determined by default rules.

test-case.name: result-document-0209
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document with missing @method. Allow HTML output method to be determined by default rules.

test-case.name: result-document-0210
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document with missing @method. Allow XHTML output method to be determined by default rules.

test-case.name: result-document-0211
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and relative @href value.

test-case.name: result-document-0212
test-case.description: Test AVT in the @href of an xsl:result-document.

modified.change: Remove spurious whitespace from expected result

all-of.serialization-matches: <out>This should be in the primary xml document</out>$

assert-result-document.assert-serialization: This should be in the secondary text document

test-case.name: result-document-0213
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document @method="xml".

test-case.name: result-document-0214
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document @method="html".

test-case.name: result-document-0215
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document @method="xhtml".

test-case.name: result-document-0216
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document @method="text".

test-case.name: result-document-0217
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and a whitespace separated list of QNames in @cdata-section-elements.

test-case.name: result-document-0218
test-case.description: Test with CDATA section element inside an LRE in the body of xsl:result-document when it has not been specified in the cdata-section-elements attribute.

test-case.name: result-document-0219
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @doctype-system, @method is xml.

test-case.name: result-document-0220
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @doctype-public present but no @doctype-system present. Show that @doctype-public is ignored.

test-case.name: result-document-0221
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @doctype-public and @doctype-system present, @method is xml.

test-case.name: result-document-0222
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @doctype-public and @doctype-system present, @method is text. Doctype attributes should be ignored.

test-case.name: result-document-0223
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @include-content-type="yes", method="html", @media-type is set and there is a 'head' element in the final result tree.

test-case.name: result-document-0224
result-document-0225
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @include-content-type="yes", method="text". @include-content-type should be ignored.

test-case.name: result-document-0226
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @media-type="text/xml".

test-case.name: result-document-0227
result-document-0228
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @omit-xml-declaration="yes", @method="xml". Declaration must be omitted from the result tree.

test-case.name: result-document-0229
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="yes".

test-case.name: result-document-0230
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="no".

test-case.name: result-document-0231
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="omit".

test-case.name: result-document-0232
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @undeclare-prefixes="yes", @method="text". Show that attribute is ignored.

test-case.name: result-document-0233
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @use-character-maps.

test-case.name: result-document-0234
test-case.description: Test with @output-version="1.0" on xsl:result-document.

test-case.name: result-document-0235
test-case.description: Test with @output-version="4.0" and @method="html" on xsl:result-document.

modified.change: Declared requirement for HTML serialization version

test-case.name: result-document-0236
test-case.description: Test with @output-version="1.0" and @method="xhtml" on xsl:result-document.

test-case.name: result-document-0237
test-case.description: Test with @output-version="5.0" and @method="text" on xsl:result-document. Version attribute should be ignored.

test-case.name: result-document-0238
test-case.description: Test @format of xsl:result-document. Verify that the matching output declaration is used. (output declarations have same local name but different namespace, namespace in-scope of xsl:result-document determines which one will be used)

modified.change: Declared serialization requirement; changed tests to all serialized

all-of.serialization-matches: <out>This document should be serialized as xml, not as text because the named my:format has method "xml".</out>$

test-case.name: result-document-0239
test-case.description: Test with various attributes in xsl:result-document and an output declaration that overrides another output declaration. Attributes that are being tested are: -method, byte-order-mark, encoding, indent, omit-xml-declaration, standalone, output-version, undeclare-prefixes

result.assert-serialization: This document should be serialized as text, not as xml, the output definition used is not overriden.

test-case.name: result-document-0240
test-case.description: Test the union of @cdata-section-elements values from xsl:result-document and one xsl:output declaration.

test-case.name: result-document-0241
test-case.description: Test that value in @use-character-maps of xsl:result-document both overrides and supplements such values in a matching output definition.

test-case.name: result-document-0242
test-case.description: Test that xsl:result-document accepts html-version attribute

test-case.name: result-document-0243
test-case.description: Test that xsl:result-document rejects invalid html-version attribute

modified.change: Wrong error code, 'five' is a faulty decimal value and should not raise SEPM0016 but XPSE0020, see #29423

test-case.name: result-document-0244
test-case.description: Test that xsl:result-document accepts dynamic html-version attribute

test-case.name: result-document-0245
test-case.description: Test that xsl:result-document accepts dynamic html-version attribute

test-case.name: result-document-0246
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="true".

test-case.name: result-document-0247
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone=" false ".

test-case.name: result-document-0248
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone=" 1 ".

test-case.name: result-document-0249
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="0".

test-case.name: result-document-0250
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @standalone="TRUE" (not allowed).

test-case.name: result-document-0251
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @omit-xml-declaration="true", @method="xml". Declaration must be omitted from the result tree.

test-case.name: result-document-0252
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @omit-xml-declaration="false". @method="xml", no @version or @encoding present, xml declaration must be written to the result tree using default attribute values.

test-case.name: result-document-0253
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document and @omit-xml-declaration=" 1 ", @method="xml". Declaration must be omitted from the result tree.

test-case.name: result-document-0254
result-document-0255
test-case.description: Test with xsl:result-document where value of @omit-xml-declaration="01" (not allowed).

test-case.name: result-document-0256
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark=" yes ". Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: result-document-0257
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="no". Encoding is UTF-8.

modified.change: Alternative result if default html-version is 5.0

test-case.name: result-document-0258
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="true". Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: result-document-0259
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="false". Encoding is UTF-8.

modified.change: Alternative result if default html-version is 5.0

test-case.name: result-document-0260
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="1". Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: result-document-0261
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="0". Encoding is UTF-8.

modified.change: Alternative result if default html-version is 5.0

test-case.name: result-document-0262
test-case.description: Test XHTML result document with @byte-order-mark="00". Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: result-document-0263
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="yes".

test-case.name: result-document-0264
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="no".

test-case.name: result-document-0265
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="true".

test-case.name: result-document-0266
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="no".

test-case.name: result-document-0267
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes=" 1".

test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="0".

test-case.name: result-document-0269
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML result document when @escape-uri-attributes="y e s" (not allowed).

test-case.name: result-document-0270
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type="yes", the result tree has a 'head' element.

test-case.name: result-document-0271
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type value set to " no ".

test-case.name: result-document-0272
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type="true", the result tree has a 'head' element.

test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type value set to "false".

test-case.name: result-document-0274
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type="1", the result tree has a 'head' element.

test-case.name: result-document-0275
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type value set to "0".

test-case.name: result-document-0276
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type="Yes" (not allowed).

test-case.name: result-document-0277
test-case.description: Test indent="yes", with XHTML result document where the stylesheet has a default namespace defined on the html element itself.

modified.change: Alternative result if default html-version is 5.0

test-case.description: Test empty elements with empty content model in XHTML output and @indent="no".

modified.change: Alternative result if default html-version is 5.0

test-case.description: Test indent="true", with XHTML result document where the stylesheet has a default namespace defined on the html element itself.

test-case.description: Test empty elements with empty content model in XHTML output and @indent=" false".

test-case.description: Test indent="1", with XHTML result document where the stylesheet has a default namespace defined on the html element itself.

test-case.description: Test empty elements with empty content model in XHTML output and @indent="0".

test-case.description: Test empty elements with empty content model in XHTML output and @indent="NO".

test-case.description: Test AVT in the @format attribute of an xsl:result-document. (Saxon bug 2559)

test-case.description: Use EQName in the format attribute of xsl:result-document

test-case.name: result-document-1001
result-document-1002
test-case.description: Test for generating two or more result trees with same URI where the first tree has an explicit xsl:result-document with href="" and the second tree is implicit

test-case.description: Test for nested xsl:result-document instructions explicitly using the principal output URI

test-case.name: result-document-1301
test-case.description: Multiple result documents produced, instruction contains 'position() eq last()' expression

modified.change: Bug 28633, the assert-xml assertion should not contain insignificant whitespace

assert-result-document.assert-xml:
Section 1 of 3

position() eq last() = false

position() ne last() = true

Section 2 of 3

position() eq last() = false

position() ne last() = true

Section 3 of 3

position() eq last() = true

position() ne last() = false
